channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Pixies played ‘Bossanova’ & ‘Trompe Le Monde’ at Brooklyn Paramount with Kurt Vile (pics, video, setlist)
item.description: Pixies brought ALL the vibes at Brooklyn Paramount with Kurt Vile! 🎸🎶 Dive into the epic night through pics and setlist now! #Pixies #ConcertVibes

item.title: “Highly Overrated” Bruce Springsteen Wraps Biggest Tour of Career with $729.7 Million in Ticket Sales
item.description: 🎸 Bruce Springsteen rocks the charts with record-breaking tour, proving he's still The Boss! 💰🎶 #TheBoss #MusicLegends

item.title: ‘Fleetwood Mac’ Turns 50. Mick Fleetwood Reminisced About Stevie and Lindsey Joining the Band
item.description: 🎉 Celebrating 50 years of 'Fleetwood Mac'! Mick Fleetwood spills the tea on Stevie and Lindsey joining the band. 🎂 #FleetwoodMac50 🎸

item.title: Carly Rae Jepsen Announces E•mo•tion Anniversary Concert
item.description: 🎉 Let's dance, CRJ fans! Carly Rae Jepsen is bringing the E•mo•tion vibes to the stage! 💃 #CRJEmotionConcert

item.title: Ariana Grande Isn’t Going to ‘Abandon’ Music, She’s Actually ‘Working on a Plan to Sing for You’
item.description: 🌟 Ariana Grande has big plans to serenade us all! 🎤 Stay tuned for more music magic! 🎶 #Arianators #NewMusicComing
